title: hsdjkahskjdh
author: hsdjkahskjdh
content: Is anyone worried that in the future miners will bomb rival miner operations to lower the competitions hashrate to make their hashrate worth more?Granted this is a currency problem in general.I seen to many deaths because of $.What would be a way to prevent miners from killing other miners? It happens with gold, USD, etc etc.Even if they do not get your coins when they kill you because of your password that is coins out of the system that makes their coins worth more.And have we cured ALS yet or are we still using hashrate on mining currency over medical problems.https://www.independent.co.uk/tech/bitcoin-robbery-torture-cryptocurrency-netherlands-a8807986.htmlhttps://futurism.com/robbers-tortured-man-drill-steal-cryptocurrencyhttps://ca.finance.yahoo.com/news/gun-wielding-crooks-torture-crypto-143143087.html

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: It's a crazy thought. I don't see why a competitor miner would do that since there is also no guarantee that they would mine more BTC if they do that. They may have that "hashrate advantage" for a brief period until the next adjustment but there will be new miners that would still emerge around the world and they cannot stop that from happening so it's like a waste of resources.
